lines.text: I thought gamblers were supposed to be gentlemen.
Supposed to be. Actually, they're just gamblers.
Maybe it's because I'm a gambler, not a crook.
Drunk or sober, this ain't no trip for a lady.
A fella told me once, he said 'Jake, if you ever get a hold of a good horse and a good woman, don't let go.' I got a good horse.
You better quit while you're ahead.
What do you want to do, shoot me?
Mind if I give you some advice? Never draw with an inside straight.
How do you know what I got?
You can't scare us. We're finished anyway. So are you. You can't shoot your way out of this one.
I'm gonna get out of here.
No, you're not. You're gonna stay here and starve to death with your belly in a knot just like the rest of us. Go on and shoot yourself some snow.
You're no good, Ryker. Robbin' and killin'... that's all you know. I hate you, Ryder. I hate your guts.
There was plenty of times when you didn't hate me.
Maybe I was too good hatin' myself.
